com.meetwise.fs
Interface FileSystem

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFileSystem, FatFileSystem
public interface FileSystem

Author:
Ewout Prangsma < epr at jnode.org>, Matthias Treydte

          Close this file system.

Method Detail

getRootEntry

FSEntry getRootEntry()
                     throws java.io.IOException
Gets the root entry of this filesystem. This is usually a directory, but this is not required.

Returns:
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on read error

isReadOnly

boolean isReadOnly()
Is the file system. mounted in read-only mode ?

Returns:

close

void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
Close this file system. After a close, all invocations of method of this file system. or objects created by this file system. will throw an IOException.

Throws:
java.io.IOException

isClosed

boolean isClosed()
Is this file system. closed.

Returns:

if -1 this feature is unsupported
